CustomField.description: Make sure all email address fields are mandatory. PagBrasil offers a free ZIP code validator (except for Magento). Please check the box below if you want this tool enabled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Make sure all email address fields are mandatory. PagBrasil offers a free ZIP code validator (except for Magento). Please check the box below if you want this tool enabled.
CustomField.label: Require Address Check
